name: Dwarven Dining Hall Brawl
description:
In the (dining) hall of the Mountain King, get ready to rumble like an earthquake!

Prove that you're not just a chip of the old block and show your opponents the true meaning of a "dining dash"! Make like a mole and use the tunnels and plateaus to your advantage! 

Just don't take for granite that your opponents will gravel in their misery. If you keep a stone face and a cool head, they dyna-mite just surrender on their own!

An player-made game created by Adventure Box user C.H

To make, play and share your own online games, visit https://www.adventurebox.com
